price: 61.Ama marak Yalli madqak Qhuraanal oobisem kee Yallih farmoyti sin fanal mekla abamkeh, kaâ fanah ama keenik iyyeenik, munaafiqhiinih yan mага derre cabtih kot cabah ken table Nabiyow.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَعَالَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ وَإِلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ رَأَيۡتَ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَنكَ صُدُودٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahum taʿālaw ilā mā anzala al-lahu wa-ilā al-rasūli ra-ayta al-munāfiqīna yaṣuddūna ʿanka ṣudūdan
